sentences.en: A plethora of new operators will be allowed to enter the market.
sentences.cn: 大批新的运营商将获准进入该市场。

sentences.en: All this plethora of sight , and feeling, and thought occurred on the instant . There was no pause of the realities wherein he moved.
sentences.cn: 尽管林林总总的形象 、 感觉 、 思想猛然袭来,在现实中他的行动却并未中断.

sentences.en: Finally, these marketers strategically plot how to gather and use plethora of digital data now available.
sentences.cn: 最后, 这些数位行销人有策略地收集以及使用目前可能的庞大数位资料.

sentences.en: Inevitably, a competition as large as the Olympic Games creates its own plethora of statistics.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 像奥运会这样的大型比赛总会创造出太多太多的统计数据.

sentences.en: Instead, there is a plethora of private security guards.
sentences.cn: 相反, 肯尼亚有极多的私人保安.

sentences.en: Its built - in programming interface has fostered a plethora of third - party application - specific enhancement programs.
sentences.cn: 它的内 置 编程接口已经促进第三者具体应用的提高程序的过剩.

sentences.en: Java comes with a plethora of ready - made types.
sentences.cn: Java配套提供了数量众多的 现成 类型.

sentences.en: Lex Luthor: Superman's number one nemesis has had a plethora of hideouts throughout the years.
sentences.cn: 莱克斯·卢瑟: 通过多年的努力,这位超人的头号敌人拥有了许多藏身之处.

sentences.en: The JDBC documentation shows a plethora of parameters for your perusal.
sentences.cn: 你会看到JDBC文件显示非常多的参数.

sentences.en: The renowned Chinese travelers Hieun Tsang and Fa Hien wrote of a plethora of sporting activities.
sentences.cn: 著名的中国旅行家玄奘和法显大量地记述了很多体育运动.

sentences.en: The report contained a plethora of detail.
These wastes may contain a plethora of heavy metals, synthetic chemicals, and other toxic materials.
sentences.cn: 这些废物可能含有以大堆重金属, 合成化学物质和其他有毒的材料.

sentences.en: This book offers a plethora of ideas, and is a wealth of regional and international information.
sentences.cn: 本书位读者提供了丰富的创意, 是国际化和具有地方特色设计的典范.

sentences.en: This place boasts a plethora of different kinds of vegetation.
sentences.cn: 这里的植被类型非常完整.

sentences.en: You can find a plethora of free workouts and workout tips online.
sentences.cn: 你可以在网上找到太多这种免费锻炼的方法和锻炼的诀窍.

trans.tran_cn: 过多，过剩，[医]多血，多血症
trans.tran_en: a very large number of something, usually more than you need
